main.name: Shashi Mishra
main.description: like to play with new frontend technologies, I have been a part of many Engineering Transformation Journeys for many multi national clients like Nationwide Building Society, Marks and Spencer, Ladbrokes and Motability (UK) which helped me to understand the actual impact of technology in businesses. I like to contribute in opensource community, run sessions, Technical Meetups and Conferences
main.bio: Over 10+ years of IT experience which includes various technologies in different area and domain like Frontend (React, Redux, Jest and Enzyme), CMS( AEM), Backend (Node, Moca, Chai, Sinnon, REST APIs, API Gateways) and Devops(Jenkins). I worked for an End to End API Building platform in which we developed and exposed APIs this helped me to understand the In and Out of the whole Architecture and the importance of scalabilty.
main.contactmessage: I am always open for new challenges shoot a mail if you have something which will not allow me to say NO

education.description: Got Higher national diploma from Execel University, London

work.title: Team Lead, Senior Associate Experience Technology L2
work.description: Worked as a Team Lead for Nationwide Building Society 'Switch Track', my work was divided into 70% coading(React, Node) and 30 team lead activites which involve preparing new praposals for our clients, backlog refienment, connecting with product owner on regualr basis, resolving inter team dependencies and running multple sessions. The project was based on Node, React, Redux

work.title: Senior Associate Experience Technology L1
work.description: I played a Javascript SME rolein the project Marks and spencer, Architechure is based on server side rendering by using Node.js, ES6, Axios. I contributed in complex modules like PLP, PDP, Home page.

work.title: Associate Experience Technology L1
work.description: Worked as a frontend developer for Ladbrokes (betting website) and Motability. Worked on Hybris related project for integration of frontend for betting website. For Motability I have developed the component in jQuery and also handle the Accesibility AAA standard with implementation of most of the AAA standard rules like color option, font size etc.

work.title: Sr UI/UX Developer
